results.content: Es ist gut programmiert, aber schlecht vermittelt. Sehr viel Copy und Paste anstatt den Code zu schreiben. Und dann testet der Author immer seine fertige Anwendung gegen des Schülers unfertigen Code. D. h. der Schüler bekommt dadurch öfters Fehlermeldungen, da der Code vom Lehrer auf die fertige Applikation abziehlt. Z. B. werden die Beans fast zum Schluß implementiert, aber während der Tests werden die schon teilweise benutzt. Also die Reihenfolge der Schulung ist damit etwas Misslungen. Aber dennoch eine gute Referenz und einfach abwarten bis zum Ende, dann löst sich alles auf.
results.content_html: Es ist gut programmiert, aber schlecht vermittelt. Sehr viel Copy und Paste anstatt den Code zu schreiben. Und dann testet der Author immer seine fertige Anwendung gegen des Schülers unfertigen Code. D. h. der Schüler bekommt dadurch öfters Fehlermeldungen, da der Code vom Lehrer auf die fertige Applikation abziehlt. Z. B. werden die Beans fast zum Schluß implementiert, aber während der Tests werden die schon teilweise benutzt. Also die Reihenfolge der Schulung ist damit etwas Misslungen. Aber dennoch eine gute Referenz und einfach abwarten bis zum Ende, dann löst sich alles auf.

results.content:
This was a good quick run through which is what I was looking for. Some versions used in the course are becoming out of date. e.g. Netbeans is now updated to 11. Primefaces is now at 7
Once I got to the galleria component it would not 'update gallery' even when I used exact java classes and webpage that is in the downloaded resources. Not sure why but didn't have time to look into it.
I was still able to get the understanding I needed from the course by reading the source code and watching the videos though so it didn't affect my learning of the content.

I was still able to get the understanding I needed from the course by reading the source code and watching the videos though so it didn't affect my learning of the content.

results.content: Very disappointing. No real Primefaces instructions and tutorial, all the course value is an example simple application developed using JSF Primefaces. Very low quality explanation of the components. Might be helpful for someone who just need a working simple application developed using JSF Primefaces to play with.
results.content_html: Very disappointing. No real Primefaces instructions and tutorial, all the course value is an example simple application developed using JSF Primefaces. Very low quality explanation of the components. Might be helpful for someone who just need a working simple application developed using JSF Primefaces to play with.

results.content: Pretty good course to get started with PrimeFaces. However don't expect for deep explanations.
results.content_html: Pretty good course to get started with PrimeFaces. However don't expect for deep explanations.

results.content: I've been working with Primefaces for about a year.  I've gone through this course before.  I wanted to go through the course working with the instructor. I was able to follow along better this time through.  Need to dive a little deeper into the materials and play around with the code.  Excellent example to play around with.  Excellent instruction to Primefaces.
results.content_html: I've been working with Primefaces for about a year. I've gone through this course before. I wanted to go through the course working with the instructor. I was able to follow along better this time through. Need to dive a little deeper into the materials and play around with the code. Excellent example to play around with. Excellent instruction to Primefaces.

results.content: While the explanations seem good for coding beginners, the delivery was a bit dry. This mostly focused on specific elements rather than more broad topics. On the bright side, I can most likely make a photo gallery now.
results.content_html: While the explanations seem good for coding beginners, the delivery was a bit dry. This mostly focused on specific elements rather than more broad topics. On the bright side, I can most likely make a photo gallery now.

results.content: This was perfect for an experienced developer who knew nothing about PrimeFaces. The overview got me oriented. Now with the PrimeFaces documentation in hand, I'm ready to get started.
results.content_html: This was perfect for an experienced developer who knew nothing about PrimeFaces. The overview got me oriented. Now with the PrimeFaces documentation in hand, I'm ready to get started.
